attributes.action: Disclose what amount of EEC grant is paid to the Dutchy of Cornwall.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How much money is paid by the EEC in grants to the Dutchy of Cornwall, in proportion to the amount of tax paid.
As you are meant to be a "socialist" is it right that the very rich and privilleged by birth are supported by the working people of Britian.
This needs to be looked at, as your expenses are now being looked into, do you think it is time that the royals should be audited as well.
